title: climbing from bronze (LF DUO)
body:
Hey guys,

I carried myself from b5 to s5 last season, although i just missed out on the boarder :(

That was extremely difficult to do solo, in this highly troll/bad elo. This season i got placed into b2, and it's just looking terrible. Like it's going to be near impossible to carry myself out again. 

I'm looking for anyone who's keen to get out of bronze. As long as you are really trying and aiming to get better. Preferably someone who actually knows how high elo/lcs players play, and are aiming to replicate that. 

I come from a competitive gaming background, and this game definitely has the most troll kids, making it difficult to climb from bronze. 

So if you're sick of feeders, trolls, and just really noob team mates who think they're challenger in this bronze hell, then add me, and we'll duo out of this.

replies.body: dude omg and i thought only i am struggling i came unto b2 from B5 2 times and back to b5 it is so annoying so i quit playing rank games for so long but i am back to rank games i have added u, lets go when ever ur free
bro, you two are too legit! Lets do this! I've sent you friend requests.

basically having the same situation as you OP. was silver last season, ended silver 1 in preseason. got placed in bronze on 3 accounts that were all mid to high silver....5-5 on 2 accounts and 8-2 on a 3rd that i expected to surely get silver after dominating every game and only losing to 4 vs 5s after the AFK fed the crap out of rivens....now i instaban riven.

got into promos....intentional feeders all DAY!

looking for a duo, hit me up if your interested.

the most annoying part: OP.GG still says my MMR is around 1200-1400 on all 3 accounts...and sure i get 30LP per win mostly...but its just horrid to climb in bronze anymore...
2 games i got PENTAS 1 vs 5 as MF and caitlyn....doesnt mean %%%% when your team throws an easy baron by trying to take out mid inhib turret with no minions...they dont know towers have bonus AR and MR when no minions, and they dont know that inhib turret deals TRUE damage...

i hav been trying to get out of bronze. i normally dontplay ranked often but this season i want change. i got placed in B3 because i decayed from s2 to b2 last season. i hav been in 4 promos in b3 and to no avail. if u want to duo i would b happy to oblige. i play jg adc mid top or support. (only jg if i can play nid, im crap at any other jg atm) support i play thresh and hav been called madlife 9 times in the past 2 weeks because of plays i hav made (winning 4v6 with a 0-33-0 renekton). adc i play kalista or twitch, top i play kha rengar, nid. mid i play anivia, nocturne, learning yasuo. if u want to have a practice game and see how we go add me in game
midnightfox
